channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m in a financial mess’: My income was cut in half. Do I sell my $600K home and kiss my 2.9% mortgage rate goodbye?
item.description: “We can move 10 miles south, where property is much cheaper.”

item.title: I’m in my 50s and divorced with a $1.7 million home. I fell in love with an old school friend. Does it make financial sense to marry?
item.description: “I have a $500,000 Roth IRA, a portfolio account of $500,000 and $300,000 in 529 plans.”

item.title: Medicare fraud spikes during open enrollment. Here’s how to protect yourself.
item.description: The annual marketing blitz puts beneficiaries at a higher risk of falling victim to scams.

item.title: Bond market may set tone for stocks with $125 billion in Treasury auctions
item.description: There’s still a lack of U.S. economic data during the government shutdown, which makes Treasury auctions all the more important to watch.

item.title: Warren Buffett is giving away $1.4 billion just before he retires, and has nearly $150 billion to go
item.description: Warren Buffett says he’s giving away about $1.4 billion to four family foundations in the weeks before he retires, then will eventually give away the ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
